jobDescription: Position ID 235949Title Talent Acquisition ManagerDescription A global, publicly traded client of The Nagler Group is seeking a Talent Acquisition Manager to join their team. In this team, you will play a strategic role in the growth and development of the TA team and have the opportunity to implement a variety of programs. You will manage a team of recruiters, sourcers, and independent contributors and work closely with senior leadership. Responsibilities:Effectively manage and coach high performing team of recruitersWork closely with Director of Talent to develop and implement proceduresDrive hiring strategy and talent developmentWork to improve and streamline hiring processesQualifications:High tech manufacturing/engineering experience strongly preferredMinimum Bachelor's degree requiredPrior experience leading TA teamsStrong recruiting acumenThis is a permanent direct hire opportunity paying between $125,000 - $140,000 plus bonus. Qualified and interested candidates please send a Word copy of your resume to Emma Huff at ehuff@naglergroup.com for immediate consideration.
